name: Frank's Bizarre Adventure
description:
This is a story of a science-wannabe Frank, who lives with his mother.. and this time, he makes and sells spice 🌶️

Follow Frank's bizarre adventure as he trying to win a competition, meanwhile selling hot pepper in his neighborhood in order to move from his mother.

This game was made during KaJam2022 (hosted by replit)

Controls:

MoveInteractAimShoot[W][A][S][D] or ARROWS[E]  or [SPACE]MouseMouse right click

*p.s. you can skip cut-scenes by pressing {Interact} x2 (twice).

We will continue working on this game.
Plans for future updates:

  • Fix bugs and rework fast-made mistakes!
  • Make prequel, where it's actually shown how Frank makes this stuff.

And, of course, we will listen to you, fellow players!
Write you comments bellow!
